commandList.sheet: Get a link to the KGA translations sheet.
commandList.wiki: Get a link to the KGA wiki (Japanese).

t1: Increases DMG dealt to non-Diamiss enemies by 10% and takes 10% reduced DMG. (Cost 15)

guardian: Increases MP/s by 70% per each enemy.
Increases All Guard by 200 and removes all negative effects on self every 10s.
Increases HP of all allies by 15%. If another ally uses the same Perk, only 5% applies.
Upon dealing DMG, reduces target's All DEF by 20%. Does not stack.
slayer: Increases Crit Chance by 150 and Crit DMG by 30%.
Increases ATK by 15% and reduces DMG taken by 15%.
Increases All Guard by 200 and reduces DMG taken by 10%.
Increases ATK by 8% every 10s. Stacks up to 8 times.
ranger: Increases Crit Chance by 150 and Crit DMG by 30%.
Increases ATK by 20% and ASPD by 1000.
Upon critical hits, deals an extra 20% ATK as DMG and reduces target's Heal Rate by 20%. Heal Rate reduction effect does not stack.
Upon attacking, increases DMG the target takes and reduces its ASPD by 200 for 10s. This effect only activates once every 3s.
Increases Crit DMG by 4% every 5s. Stacks up to 25 times and is irremovable.
mystic: Increases ATK by 20% and ASPD by 1000.
Increases MP/s by 70% per each enemy.
Increases all allies' Crit DMG by 20%. If another ally uses the same Perk, only 10% applies.
Upon attacking, reduces the target's ATK by 15% and Crit Chance by 150. Does not stack.
wizard: Increases Crit Chance by 150 and Crit DMG by 30%.
Takes 15% increased DMG, but increases ATK by 40%.
Increases all allies' ATK by 15%. If another ally uses the same Perk, only 3% applies.
Upon taking a hit, becomes invulnerable for 3s. This effect only activates once every 45s.
medic: Every 10s, heal all allies by 10% their Max HP.
Increases ASPD of all allies by 1500. If another ally uses the same Perk, only 500 applies.
Increases Crit Chance of all allies by 150. If another ally uses the same Perk, only 50 applies.
Upon taking a hit, becomes invulnerable for 3s. This effect only activates once every 45s.

combo.name: Hundred Gods Stampede
combo.description: Deals 896% P.DMG to all enemies and knocks them down for 2s. Hit enemies take 30% increased all DMG for 10s.

passive.name: Sabbath's Black Goat
passive.description: Upon auto attacking, there is a 20% chance of dealing an extra 110.25% P.DMG and stunning the hit enemy for 0.7s. If Maki is in the [Flame of Ruin] state, the chance for this passive increases by 40%.

s1.name: Flame Reams
s1.description: Deals 1,176% P.DMG to nearby enemies. Upon a Crit Hit, increases Maki's Crit DMG by 3% for 10 secs. This effect can be stacked up to 30 times. Each hit also have a 30% chance of dealing an extra 823.2% P.DMG, and inflict stun on the hit enemy for 3s.

s2.name: Beast Engrave
s2.description: Deals 576.45% P.DMG to enemies in a medium range in front of self, stunning hit enemies by 3s and increasing P.DMG they take by 50% for 10s. Afterwards, Maki enters [Flame of Ruin] state for 10s, increasing her own ATK by 154.35%.

uw.name: God Hunting Sword
uw.description: Grants a stack of [Destruction Flame] on self upon hits. Upon the 50th stack of [Destruction Flame], consume all stacks to enter [God Hunting] state for 15s. While under [God Hunting], SPD is increased by **(0)**, Crit DMG is increased by **(1)**, and Crit Chance is increased by **(2)**. [Destruction Flame] does not stack while under [God Hunting].

utp.name: Passive UT: Maki's Ribbon
utp.description: [Sabbath's Black Goat] For 30s after battle start, increase passive activation chance by **(0)** and SPD by 350.

ut1.name: UT1: Family Photo
ut1.description: [Flame Reams] Removes all debuffs on self upon casting. Each hit have a **(0)** chance of dispelling all buffs on the enemy hit.

ut2.name: UT2: Cat Plushie
ut2.description: [Beast Engrave] Reduces Cooldown by 30%, and during [Flame of Ruin], Maki's SPD is increased by 250, and [Sabbath's Black Goat] activation chance is further increased by **(0)**.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.light: When there is only 1 enemy, DMG is increased by 100%.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.dark: While in the [Flame of Ruin] state, increase own ATK by 100%.

t5.dark: When MP is at max, increases ATK by 50% for 15s. This effect only activates once in 20s.

combo.name: Hundred Gods Stampede
combo.description: Deals 896% P.DMG to all enemies and knocks them down for 2s. Hit enemies take 30% increased all DMG for 10s.

passive.name: Countryside White Fox
passive.description: All damage taken is reduced by 15%. Every 15 seconds from the beginning each battle, increases MDEF of one ally with the lowest HP by 31.5% for 10 seconds, and heals them by 2% their Max HP per second.

s1.name: Scattering Cherry Blossoms
s1.description: Removes all debuffs of all allies around the ally with the lowest HP, and heals them by 960% ATK.

s2.name: Falling Cherry Blossoms
s2.description: Attacks an enemy and enemies surrounding it 6 times, dealing a total of 529.2% M.DMG. Hit enemies are stunned for 6s and takes 25% increased All DMG. Also, deploys a shield on all allies that blocks 296.55% ATK DMG for 12s. While the shield is active, allies gain immunity to CC.

uw.name: Rush of a Hundred Flowers
uw.description: Every 8s, heals the 4 allies with the lowest HP by **(0)** ATK, and increases Crit Chance of the ally with the highest ATK by 300, and their Crit DMG by **(1)**.

utp.name: Passive UT: Microphone
utp.description: [Countryside White Fox] Removes all debuffs on the target ally, and increases their Heal Rate by **(0)** for the duration.

ut1.name: UT1: Fan Letter
ut1.description: [Scattering Cherry Blossoms] Increase Heal Rate by 50%, and healed allies become immune to DMG for **(0)**.

ut2.name: UT2: Maple-Pattern Handkerchief
ut2.description: [Falling Cherry Blossoms] Hit targets takes 20% increased M.DMG and the stun duration is increased by **(0)**. Shield strength is also increased by 50% and allies recover **(1)** MP per sec over 4s.

passive.name: Passive
passive.light: For the duration of the skill, DMG taken from non-Diamiss enemies is reduced by 30%.
passive.dark: Applies to 2 allies at the same time.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.light: MP cost is increased by 1000, but targets 2 allies.
s1.dark: Healed allies take 25% reduced M.DMG for 10s.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.light: MP cost is increased by 1000, but DMG is increased by 80% and shield strength is increased by 40%.
s2.dark: Reduces Cooldown by 3s and changes the target to a random enemy.

t5.dark: Increases ATK of all allies by 5% of own ATK.

combo.name: Love Poison
combo.description: Dispel all buffs from 2 enemies with the highest ATK, and inflict [Love Poison] on them that deals 1600% M.DMG over 8s. Targets under [Love Poison] have their All Block reduced by 30% and MP Recovery reduced by 50%. [Love Poison] DMG is only based off of Moegi's ATK.

passive.name: Mark of Deprivation
passive.description: Inflicts one stack of [Mark of Deprivation] upon dealing DMG. Upon the 10th stack of [Mark of Deprivation], consumes all stacks to deal 44.4% M.DMG, inflict stun for 2s, and reduces hit enemies' ATK by 20%.

s1.name: Snatch
s1.description: Deals 497.4% M.DMG to enemies around the target and stuns them for 3s. Also, reduces Cooldown of the ally with the highest ATK by 3s, and increases their ATK by 220.5% for 15s.

s2.name: Deprive
s2.description: Heals all allies except Sadame by 844.8%, and increases their PDEF by 20% for 5s. Deals 168.6% M.DMG to surrounding enemies over 8 hits, knocks them down for 3s, and reduces their MDEF by 10% for 5s.

uw.name: Farsa
uw.description: Upon hittings 5 normal attacks on an enemy, increases M.DMG it takes by **(0)** and stuns it for 0.5s.

utp.name: Passive UT: Collar
utp.description: [Mark of Deprivation] Stun duration is increased by 1s, and hit targets take **(0)** increased M.DMG.

ut1.name: UT1: Smartphone
ut1.description: [Snatch] Dispel all buffs on enemies hit. Per each enemy hit, recovers **(0)** MP.

ut2.name: UT2: Suspicious Vial
ut2.description: [Deprive] Reduces MP cost by 1000, and reduces P.DMG allies take by **(0)** for 10s.

passive.name: Passive
passive.dark: The number of stacks required is reduced from 10 to 7.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.light: Increases own ASPD by 350 after use.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.dark: Increases the duration of MDEF reduction by 5s.

t5.dark: At the beginning of the first battle, increases PDEF of the ally with the highest ATK by 20% of own PDEF. This effect cannot be dispelled.

combo.name: Execution
combo.description: Deals 3120% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, and recover MP of all allies by 1000.

passive.name: Snake's Obsession
passive.description: Upon attacking, increases ATK by 5.25% and Crit Chance by 100 for 10 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

s1.name: Bullet Rain
s1.description: Shoots 12 bullets to random enemies and deal a total of 4060.8% P.DMG. Each time an attack hits, increase Crit Chance of one random ally by 5% for 10 sec.

s2.name: Inferno Cannon
s2.description: Fires in a straight line, dealing 3440.4% P.DMG to enemies in range and knocks them down for 3 sec. Against Bosses, deals additional 3440.4% P.DMG that ignores DEF.

uw.name: Viper
uw.description: Upon Critical Hits, own SPD is increased by 200 for 10s, and for the duration, each auto attack deals an extra **(0)** P.DMG to the target.

utp.name: Passive UT: Luxury Tea Set
utp.description: [Snake's Obsession] When [Snake's Obsession] stacks is 2 or more, increases SPD by 100 per [Snake's Obsession] stack, and DMG dealt to non-Diamiss enemies is increased by **(0)**.

ut1.name: UT1: Father's Pocketwatch
ut1.description: [Bullet Rain] Reduces MP Cost by 1000 and Cooldown by **(0)**.

ut2.name: UT2: Ancient Magic Codex
ut2.description: [Inferno Cannon] Increases DMG by **(0)**, and increases P.DMG the targets take by 20% for 10s.

passive.name: Passive
passive.light: Increases the max number of stacks to 5.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.dark: Crit Chance buff will always apply to self.

t5.dark: Reduces Crit Chance by 300, but increases Crit DMG by 150%.

combo.name: Execution
combo.description: Deals 3120% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, and recover MP of all allies by 1000.

passive.name: Evil Eye of Ruin
passive.description: Inflicts a stack of [Black Flame] upon hitting an enemy. Enemies affected by [Black Flame] take 192% M.DMG over 20 sec. [Black Flame] can be stacked up to max 10 times.

s1.name: Shadow Roar
s1.description: Deals 2150.4% M.DMG to an enemy and enemies surrounding it, stunning them for 2s. If the target is a boss, deals an extra 2150.4% M.DMG.

s2.name: Dark Matter
s2.description: Attacks all enemies 5 times, dealing a total of 3684% M.DMG. This attack haves 150% increased Crit DMG.

uw.name: Magic Wand Sheidel
uw.description: Skill hits deal an additional **(0)** M.DMG for each stack of [Black Flame] on the enemy.

utp.name: Passive UT: Dance Shoes
utp.description: [Evil Eye of Ruin] [Black Flame] becomes irremovable and enemies take **(0)** increased M.DMG per each stack of [Black Flame].

ut1.name: UT1: Locket Pendant
ut1.description: [Shadow Roar] MP Cost is reduced by 1000 and DMG is increased by **(0)**.

ut2.name: UT2: Perfume
ut2.description: [Dark Matter] Increases DMG by **(0)**. Upon Crit Hitting an enemy with 5 or more stacks of [Black Flame], reduces Cooldown by 3%. Upon killing an enemy, reduces Cooldown by 20%.

passive.name: Passive
passive.light: Increases the max stacks of [Black Flame] to 12.
passive.dark: Every 10s, enemies with [Black Flame] are stunned for 2s. Enemies with 10 or more stacks of [Black Flame] are stunned for 3s instead.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.light: Enemies hit with 10 or more stacks of [Black Flame] takes 40% increased M.DMG for 10s.
s1.dark: Inflicts 10 stacks of [Black Flame] on hit enemies.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.dark: If there are at least 5 enemies, reduces MP Cost by 2000 and Cooldown by 5s.

t5.dark: Enemies with 10 or more stacks of [Black Flame] takes 30% increased M.DMG. Every second, inflicts 2 stacks of [Black Flame] to all non-Diamiss enemies.

combo.name: Barbarian's Song
combo.description: Deals 1331.2% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, knocks them down for 2s, and reduces their ATK by 30% for 8s. Also increases ATK of all allies by 30% for 8s.

passive.name: Rebellious Guardian
passive.description: Upon Guarding, deals 33.6% P.DMG to enemies in front, recovers 300 MP for Zekka, reduces Cooldown of [Claw Techniques - Hard Climbing] (S2) by 0.5s and increases Zekka's Heal Rate by 20% for 8s. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

s1.name: Savage Assault Cry
s1.description: Deals 470.4% P.DMG to enemies in front, and stuns them for 3s. Hit enemies have their All DEF reduced by 30%.

s2.name: Claw Techniques - Hard Climbing
s2.description: Deals 667.2% P.DMG to enemies within range. If this Skill is Guarded, reduces its Cooldown by 0.5s. Also, increases PDEF and P.Guard of all allies by 126.2% and 30% for 20s.

uw.name: Red Lotus Dark Claw
uw.description: Upon using Skills 3 times, increases ATK and PDEF of all allies by **(0)** for 10s.

utp.name: Passive UT: Fellow Dog Tag
utp.description: [Rebellious Guardian] Upon activating, heals Zekka for 2% her Max HP and increases her PDEF by **(0)** for 5s.

ut1.name: UT1: Oil Lighter
ut1.description: [Savage Assault Cry] Upon activating, recovers 2000 MP. Hit enemies take **(0)** increased P.DMG for 10s.

ut2.name: UT2: Broken Bike Key
ut2.description: [Claw Technique - Hard Climbing] Removes all debuffs on self upon casting and increases PDEF buff by **(0)**. Hit enemies have their P.Guard and Crit Chance reduced by 500 and **(1)** for 10s.

passive.name: Passive
passive.dark: Increases Heal Rate by an additional 10% upon activating.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.dark: Increases MP Cost by 1000 and DMG by 50%.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.dark: Stuns hit targets for 1s, and allies takes 25% reduced P.DMG for the duration of the buff.

t5.dark: When an ally except Zekka is hit, increases PDEF and P.Guard of all allies by 20% for 5s. This effect only activates once every 10s.

combo.name: Red Night Mist
combo.description: Deals 1680% P.DMG to all enemies. Also restores HP of all allies by 30% of maximum HP.

passive.name: Thunder Beast
passive.description: Increases own DMG to Non-Diamis enemies by 2% every sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times. At 20 stacks or more, increases DMG of normal attacks by 100%.

s1.name: Thunder Slash
s1.description: Deals 825.3% P.DMG to enemies within range, and the first attack knocks them down for 3 sec and reduces their ATK by 25% for 10 sec.

s2.name: Thundercloud Breakthrough
s2.description: Deals 1316.7% P.DMG to all enemies in range. The last attack knocks down enemies for 4 sec. While using the skill, gains CC immunity for 5 sec.

uw.name: Black Cloud Plexus
uw.description: Increase own Max HP by **(0)**. Normal attacks have a 15% chance of dealing additional P.DMG equal to **(1)** of ATK and stunning them for 2s.

utp.name: Passive UT: Saya's Ribbon
utp.description: [Thunder Beast] Changes the max number of stacks to 30, and upon gaining 30 stacks, increases own Crit Chance by **(0)**.

ut1.name: UT1: Music Box
ut1.description: [Thunder Slash] Reduces the target's ATK by an additional 20% and increases P.DMG target receives by **(0)** for 10 sec.

ut2.name: UT2: Seashell Necklace
ut2.description: [Thundercloud Breakthrough] DMG is increased by 50%, and the last hit increases All DMG the target takes by **(0)** for 10 sec.

passive.name: Passive
passive.dark: Each stack reduces DEF by 3%, but increases DMG dealt to non-Diamiss enemies by an additional 0.5%.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.dark: The DMG of this Skill increases by 15% with each cast. Stacks up to 10 times.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.dark: Saya gains immunity to DMG for 5s after use.

t5.dark: Reduces All DMG taken by 30% and heals Saya for 10% ATK per second.

combo.name: Maximum Drive
combo.description: Deals 2400% M.DMG to 3 random enemies and knocks them down for 2 sec. Hit enemies have their MP reduced by 2000.

passive.name: Plague Wind
passive.description: Normal and Skill attacks inflicts [Wind Disease] on a target, dealing a total of 120% continuous M.DMG and reducing Heal Rate by 5% over 20 sec. [Wind Disease] can be stacked up to max 5 times.

s1.name: Spiral Duet
s1.description: Attacks a random enemy and its nearby enemies 3 times, dealing a total of 1346.4% M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec.

s2.name: Kamikaze Storm
s2.description: Attacks enemies within a wide frontal range of self 6 times, dealing a total of 3448.8% M.DMG and knocking them down for 3 sec.

uw.name: Lion Claw Wand
uw.description: Deals M.DMG equal to **(0)** of ATK to enemies inflicted with [Wind Disease] every 7 sec, reducing their M.DEF by **(1)** and increasing M.DMG they take by **(2)** for 10 sec.

utp.name: Passive UT: An Art Book of Your Favorite Painter
utp.description: [Plague Wind] [Wind Disease] effect becomes irremovable and for the duration of [Wind Disease], targets take **(0)** increased M.DMG.

ut1.name: UT1: Makeup Pouch
ut1.description: [Spiral Duet] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by **(0)**.

ut2.name: UT2: Heart Necklace
ut2.description: [Kamikaze Storm] DMG is increased by **(0)**. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with 5 or more stacks of [Wind Disease], skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.

passive.name: Passive
passive.light: Reduces targets' ATK by 5% per stack of [Wind Disease].
passive.dark: If the target is a boss, increases DMG of [Wind Disease] by 300%.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.light: Reduces MP of the hit target by 250. Reduces MP by 500 if the target is a boss.
s1.dark: Recovers own MP by 250 upon a Critical Hit.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.light: Increases MP Cost by 1000 and DMG by 100%.
s2.dark: Increases MP Cost by 1000 and dispels positive effects of enemies within range.

t5.dark: At the beginning of each battle, immediately reduces all Skill Cooldown of self by 30% and increases DMG dealt to Non-Diamiss enemies by 20% for 90s. This effect is irremovable.

combo.name: None
combo.specifics: This combo skill haven't been implemented, yet.

passive.name: Blessing of the Earth
passive.description: Every 7 sec, an ally with the lowest HP recovers 1 orb of mana and heals 180.6% of Karin's ATK as HP.

s1.name: Philia
s1.description: Heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 10% of their Max HP, and 1104% Karin's ATK over 8s. This effect cannot be dispelled.

s2.name: Bios
s2.description: Cleanses negative effects from all allies, and increases their MDEF by 63% for 20s.

uw.name: Magic Wand Cleopatra
uw.description: Every 20s, grants a buff to the ally with the lowest HP for 5s that make them immune to P.DMG, their HP cant be lowered below 1%, and increases their MP/sec by **(0)**.

utp.name: Passive UT: Brother's Photo
utp.description: [Blessing of the Earth] Increases Heal by 50%, and increases target's ATK by **(0)** for 4s.

ut1.name: UT1: Mother's Scarf
ut1.description: [Philia] Reduces MP Cost by 1000 and Cooldown by **(0)**.

ut2.name: UT2: Pectoral
ut2.description: [Bios] Increases MDEF Boost by 50%, and reduces Cooldown by **(0)**.

passive.name: Passive
passive.dark: Additionally recovers 1000 MP for the ally with highest ATK.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.light: MP cost is increased by 1000, but targets all allies.
s1.dark: Every heal has a 20% chance of cleansing all debuffs from the target.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.dark: Additionally increases all allies' MDEF by 10% of Karin's MDEF.

t5.dark: Auto attacks have a 10% chance of reducing the target's All DEF by 20%, and reduces Karin's Skill Cooldown by 5%.

combo.name: None
combo.specifics: This combo skill haven't been implemented, yet.

passive.name: Rainbow-Colored Eyes
passive.description: Every 15s, deals 116.1% P.DMG to 4 random enemies and inflict 1 of the following: [Deal an extra 270% P.DMG over 10s], [Knockdown for 2s], [Stun for 5s].

s1.name: Cheer Bright
s1.description: Increases the ATK of all allies by 63% for 120 sec, and grants 3 random additional effects: [Increase Crit by 70], [Increase ATK Spd by 100], [Restores 500 MP]. Additional effects can stack up to 5 times.

s2.name: Healing Shine
s2.description: Heals all allies by 540% ATK, and grant a buff that heals 1% their Max HP per second for 10s. Each heal have a 20% chance of being doubled.

uw.name: Veriterupe
uw.description: Reduces all skill cooldowns by **(0)**, and increases the Crit and ASPD buff of [Cheer Bright] by **(1)** and **(2)**.

utp.name: Passive UT: Book Written by Father
utp.description: [Rainbow-Colored Eye] Changes the target to all enemies. Upon activation, recovers all allies' MP by **(0)**.

ut1.name: UT1: Magnifying Glass
ut1.description: [Cheer Bright] Reduces MP Cost by 1000, and increases all allies' M.DEF by **(0)**. This effect stacks up to 8 times.

ut2.name: UT2: Thin Book
ut2.description: [Healing Shine] Increases Healing by 20%, and the chance of double recovery by **(0)**.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.dark: All effects stack up to 8 times.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.light: Increases MP Cost by 1000, and cleanses all debuffs from all allies.
s2.dark: Each heal has a 15% chance to recover 1000 MP.

t5.dark: Auto atacks have a 30% chance of applying one of the following to the ally with the lowest HP: [Heals by 3% Max HP] , [Recovers 5% MP].

combo.name: None
combo.specifics: This combo skill haven't been implemented, yet.

passive.name: Wisdom of the Duke of Mind
passive.description: Increases all allies' ATK by 6.3%. Upon using a Skill, Tsukasa gains one stack of [Knowledge]. Upon the 3rd stack of [Knowledge], Tsukasa gains [Wisdom of the Duke of Mind], increasing her Crit DMG by 30% and all skill effects by 10%. [Wisdom of the Duke of Mind] stacks up to 5 times, and cannot be dispelled.

s1.name: Academic Grant
s1.description: For 12s, increases all allies' ATK by 322.5%, and their DMG dealt to Bosses by 15%.

s2.name: Mind Control
s2.description: Attacks the target and its surroundings twice, dealing a total of 2409.6% M.DMG and knocks them down for 5s. Hit targets take 30% increased M.DMG for 10s.

uw.name: Illusion of Wisdom
uw.description: Increases the max stack of [Wisdom of the Duke of Mind] to **(0)**, and Tsukasa gains one stack of [Knowledge] every **(1)**.

utp.name: Passive UT: Colored Lipstick
utp.description: [WIsdom of the Duke of Mind] Increases ATK Boost by 50%, and increases all allies' Crit DMG by **(0)** upon gaining [Wisdom of the Duke of Mind].

ut1.name: UT1: Monocle
ut1.description: [Academic Grant] Reduces MP Cost by 1000, and increases buff duration by **(0)**.

ut2.name: UT2: Fantasy Novel
ut2.description: [Mind Control] Per each enemy hit, reduces Cooldown by 10% and increases DMG by **(0)**.

passive.name: Passive
passive.dark: Upon activation, increases own ATK by 50%.

s1.name: Skill 1
s1.light: Changes the DMG dealt to Bosses bonus to 25% for the first 3 uses.
s1.dark: Reduces Cooldown by 3s and MP Cost by 1000.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.light: Increases MP Cost by 1000 and DMG by 100%.
s2.dark: Hit targets take increased All DMG instead of only M.DMG.

t5.dark: Reduces all skills Cooldown by 15% every 20s.

combo.name: None
combo.specifics: This combo skill haven't been implemented, yet.

passive.name: Fallen Angel of Lazyness
passive.description: Yurara gains 1 [Rest] every 0.5s and 10 [Rest] every 1000 MP spent. Upon reaching 100 [Rest], she gets [Motivated], increases her ATK by 31.5% for 15s, and all skills Cooldown is reduced by 10% upon normal attacking. Yurara does not gain [Rest] while [Motivated]. All effects are irremovable.

s1.name: Immoral Heart
s1.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies, heals them for 378% ATK over 10s, and reduces their DMG taken by 30% for the duration. If Yurara is [Motivated], all allies additionally gain 250 Crit Chance and immunity to CC.

s2.name: Invitation to Depravity
s2.description: Deals 1344% M.DMG to all enemies around a random target. If Yurara is [Motivated], deals an additional 3024% M.DMG over 5s, and stuns targets for 1s.

uw.name: Sin of Sloth
uw.description: Every **(0)**, gains 1 stack of [Rest] and recovers 1% MP.

utp.name: Passive UT: Male Idol Photobook
utp.description: [Fallen Angel of Lazyness] At the start of battle, gains 50 stacks of [Rest]. While [Motivated], Cooldown reduction upon normal attacks is further reduced by **(0)**.

ut1.name: UT1: Eye Mask
ut1.description: [Immoral Mind] Reduces MP Cost by 1000 and healing by **(0)**.

ut2.name: UT2: Mahjong Tiles
ut2.description: [Invitation to Depravity] Increases DMG by **(0)**, and upon each hit, gains 2 stacks of [Rest].

t5.dark: While [Motivated], increases all allies' ASPD by 2000, and increases their ATK by 5% of Yurara's ATK.

combo.name: Howling Moon
combo.description: Deals 2000% M.DMG and recovers all allies' MP by 3000. Additionally increases ASPD of the ally with the highest ATK by 5000 for 20s.

passive.name: Star Prayer
passive.description: Increases M.DEF of all allies by 12.6% + 5% Hikari's M.DEF, and M.Guard by 250. When Hikari uses a skill, reduces M.DMG all allies take by 25% for 5s.

s1.name: Milky Way
s1.description: Heal all allies by 504% ATK and recovers their MP by 2000. Healed allies take 15% reduced M.DMG for 10s. If the targe's HP is 50% or lower, increases healing amount by 50%.

s2.name: Moon Halo
s2.description: Deploys a shield on the ally with the lowest HP, blocking 1512% ATK DMG for 15s. While the shield is active, increases the target's ATK by 504%, and heals them for a total of 2025% ATK.

uw.name: Celestial Staff
uw.description: Increases Heal Rate of all allies by **(0)**, and their M.DEF by 5% Hikari's ATK. Every 5s, heals the ally with the lowest HP by **(1)** ATK.

utp.name: Passive UT: School Rooftop Key
utp.description: [Star Prayer] Restores **(0)** MP for all allies every second, but Hikari can't move for **(1)** upon wave starts.

ut1.name: UT1: Astronomy Telescope
ut1.description: [Milky Way] Increases M.DMG reduction by an additional **(0)**, and all allies' Heal Rate increases by 25% for 10s.

ut2.name: UT2: Zodiac Chart
ut2.description: Reduces Cooldown by **(0)** and increases target's DMG dealt to non-Diamiss enemies by 20% for 15s.

passive.name: Passive
passive.light: Increases M.DEF buff by 20% and M.DMG reduction by 5%.
passive.dark: Upon using a skill, increases Resilience (?) of all allies by 25% for 5s.

s2.name: Skill 2
s2.light: Changes the target to the ally with the highest ATK.

t5.dark: Restores 350 MP for all allies every 3s.
